verses.roman:
pūrvavat ratha-yātrā-kāla yābe āila
sabā lañā guṇḍicā-mandira prakṣālila

synonyms: pūrva-vat—as in the previous year; ratha-yātrā-kāla—the time for Ratha-yātrā festival; yābe—when; āila—arrived; sabā lañā—taking all of them; guṇḍicā-mandira—the temple of Guṇḍicā; prakṣālila—washed.
translation: As in the previous year, they all washed the Guṇḍicā temple when the time for Ratha-yātrā arrived.
